bike.description: FACT 11m carbon, 29" geometry, FACT IS construction, tapered HT, carbon PF-30 BB, sliding dropouts

components.description: Custom Specialized/RockShox Reba S29 fork with size-specific travel, is the lightest, stiffest performance XC fork, featuring Brain Fade adjustment, tapered carbon crown/steerer, and Reba lower
1-1/8 and 1.5" Threadless, Campy style upper with 1.5" lower, cartridge bearings
32.6mm clamp, one bolt for carbon frame/post
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
